body:
# How this project started:

I started learning C++ one month ago and one friend told me to test my skills by writing a simply program.

Thus I started writing a simply game to test my skills. Also with everything new I will learn will be added to the game. 

So this game will be updating until I finish my studies at the language.


I hope you like it.

Report any bug here [Issues Page](https://github.com/Reap3RGHS/Reapers-Battleship/issues)

Check the wiki page here [Wiki](https://github.com/Reap3RGHS/Reapers-Battleship/wiki/_pages)

# Download:

To download this project you must clone it using this command : 

git clone https://github.com/Reap3RGHS/Reapers-Battleship

# How to install:
Installation is very simple.

## Don't download the zip/tar.gz file if you want to take all the new updates.

# Install: 

*  Open a terminal.

*  Type:

`git clone https://github.com/Reap3RGHS/Reapers-Battleship`

*  Go to the game directory:

`cd Reapers-Battleship`

*  Give to the game script root privileges:

`chmod u+x reapers_battleship.sh`

*  Run the game by typing:

`./reapers_battleship.sh`

### You can open it with double click from the game folder.


Don't forget to report bugs here : [Issues Page](https://github.com/Reap3RGHS/Reapers-Battleship/issues)

Contact with Reap3RGHS : reaperghs@gmail.com
